WorkItem.Description:
As the title says, ever since I've downloaded the latest patch, v2.2.24 any time I do anything in Rawr it takes a long time and drives both my cores to 100% usage.  This includes changing the graph from different slots, clicking on a piece of equipment to change to something else, anything.  The little spinning wheel comes out, it cranks away and eventually returns successfully (hasn't actually crashed yet).  Its basically making the thing unusable.
 
Anyone else experiencing this problem?
WorkItem.Summary: [DPSDK] Rawr takes an incredibly long time to do anything now

Comments.Message: You did not even specify a model, but I suppose this does only happen with a character loaded. Could you supply this character either by armory link or character file?

Good point.  Happens for both DKTank and DPSDK.  Char is here: http://eu.wowarmory.com/character-sheet.xml?r=Dragonblight&n=Allysa

Currently in Tank spec obviously.
In TankDK this may be related to the MoB defect that is already written up.  So I'll leave this defect for Bloody or Soriara to track for DPSDK.

I did read that post and didn't make the connection as I could have sworn it was also happening in my DPSDK.  However, now that you've pointed it out I've gone back, removed the point in Mark of Blood and retested and everything seems back to normal.  I've also tested my dps spec and that doesn't seem to have the problem.

Bottom line, this certainly seems to be a duplicate.
ok... if it's a dup.  Then closing as such.
